description: This table contains the users, providers, and messages related to procedure verbal orders and cosign orders.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the table.

columns.name: SIGNED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of order signing the row represents. Note: Any type can have cosigner data.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Ordering


Cosign


Discontinuing


Pending Discontinue


Edit


Delete


Continue on Transfer


Discontinue on Transfer


New on Transfer


Unreview on Transfer


Holding


Unholding


Order and Hold


Assigning Administration Responsibility

columns.name: VERB_COMM_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique provider record ID for the provider communicating the verbal order.

columns.name: VERB_SGNER_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique user record ID for the user signing the verbal order.

columns.name: VERB_MSGRC_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique user record ID for the recipient of the In Basket message for the verbal order.

columns.name: VERB_MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique In Basket message record ID of the In Basket message created by the verbal order.

columns.name: VERB_SIGNED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the verbal order was signed.

columns.name: VERBAL_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mode associated with the verbal order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Verbal


Standard

columns.name: ORDER_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique provider record ID for the ordering provider.

columns.name: AUTH_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique provider record ID for the authorizing provider.

columns.name: CSGN_MSGRC_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique user record ID for the recipient of the cosigned In Basket message.

columns.name: CSGN_MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique In Basket message record ID of the cosigned In Basket message.

columns.name: CSGN_SIGNED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the order was cosigned.

columns.name: COSIGNER_ID
columns.description: The unique user record ID for the order cosigner.

columns.name: IS_HOSPITALIST_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the order was by a hospitalist.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: VERB_ORD_CMT
columns.description: Verbal order comment.

columns.name: CSGN_CREATE_DTTM
columns.description: When the cosign requirement was created (UTC Time).

columns.name: CSGN_RQRD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores whether or not an order requires a cosign based on when a new line is added to the verbal order category type (I ORD 34800).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Administratively Closed

columns.name: SIG_REQ_CRT_USER_ID
columns.description: If the order signature requirement was manually created, this item stores the ID of the user who created the requirement.

columns.name: SIG_REQ_CRT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column is the creation source for order signature requirements.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Automatically Created


HIM


Create Signature Requirement Utility


Patient Creator Utility


Bulk Orders Utility


Beacon


Inactive User Attached to Ordering Provider


Instant Orders


Cosign Checkbox


Cosign Rule


LQL


Profile Setting 8535 - Admission Orders


Profile Setting 8536 - Code Status Orders


Profile Setting 38800 - RW Bulk Orders


Home Health Code Status Order


Anesthesia Sedation Order


Radiant Change Order LPP


Cadence Decision Tree


Security EC36 - Rx Non-controlled


Security EC37 - Rx Controlled w/o C-II


Security EC90 - OP Procedures


Security EC104 - Rx Schedule II


Security EC235 - IP Non-controlled


Security EC236 - IP Controlled w/o C-II


Security EC237 - IP Schedule II


Security EC238 - IP Procedure


Security EC282 - DC Med
